title: Having Now Faith | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Having Now Faith | Joel Osteen
description:
It's good to have faith for the future, but God wants to do something amazing in your life today. Learn to expect His favor daily. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
